Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 3 Vedanāttika » 3.1 Paṭiccavāra » 3.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Navippayuttaduka
Tika
Vedanāttika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Navippayuttaduka
Tika
1871Navippayuttapaccayā nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ…pe… .
<< Navippayuttadukaup Dasaka >>
